data.author: Snape–The Deathly Hallows
data.quote: After all this time? Always

data.author: Dumbledore-The Deathly Hallows
data.quote: Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean it is not real?

data.author: Dumbledore-The Philosopher's stone
data.quote: Ah, music, A magic beyond all we do here!

data.author: Dumbledore-The Half-Blood Prince
data.quote: Let us step into the night and pursue that flighty temptress, adventure.

data.author: Dumbledore-The Goblet of Fire
data.quote: It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.

data.author: Hagrid-The Goblet of Fire
data.quote: I am what I am an’ I’m not ashamed. ‘Never be ashamed,’ my ol’ dad used ter say, ‘there’s some who’ll hold it against you, but they’re not worth bothern’ with.

data.author: Luna Lovegood–The Order of the Phoenix
data.quote: Things we lose have a way of coming back to us in the end, if not always in the way we expect.

data.author: Jack Ma
data.quote: You’ve got to make your team have value, innovation, and vision.

data.author: Jack Ma
data.quote: Never give up. Today is hard, tomorrow will be worse, but the day after tomorrow will be sunshine.

data.author: Jack Ma
data.quote: The very important thing you should have is patience.

data.author: Jack Ma
data.quote: We’re never in lack of money. We lack people with dreams, (people) who can die for those dreams.

data.author: Jack Ma
data.quote: It doesn’t matter if I failed. At least I passed the concept on to others. Even if I don’t succeed, someone will succeed.

data.author: Jack Ma
data.quote: You should learn from your competitor, but never copy. Copy and you die.

data.author: Jack Ma
data.quote: You never know how much can you do in your life.

data.author: Jack Ma
data.quote: A peace talk is always difficult, always complicated.

data.author: Jack Ma
data.quote: A leader should have higher grit and tenacity, and be able to endure what the employees can’t.

data.author: Jack Ma
data.quote: If we are a good team and know what we want to do, one of us can defeat ten of them.

data.author: Jack Ma
data.quote: You never know that the things you’re doing are that meaningful to society.

data.author: Jack Ma
data.quote: When you are small, you have to be very focused and rely on your brain, not your strength.

data.author: Jack Ma
data.quote: Opportunity lies in the place where the complaints are.
